events.message: The candidate's application for the software engineer position has been received and logged into the system.
The applicant was categorized under the Engineering cluster after reviewing keywords like software engineer and developer.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's process.
Initial screening interview completed; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development principles.
Candidate responded positively to scheduling the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess coding and problem-solving abilities.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, showing strong command of software engineering concepts.
HR interview scheduled to discuss candidate's fit within the company culture and benefits package.
HR interview completed with positive feedback regarding candidate's communication skills and attitude.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary and other benefits as discussed in prior interviews.
The candidate provided positive feedback and expressed excitement about the offered role and terms.
Candidate has formally accepted the job offer to join as a software engineer starting next month.
Onboarding process has started including system access and introductory meetings for the new software engineer.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the team.
